sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <mainHeader/>
    <v-card color="basil">

      <v-tabs
        v-model="tab"
        bg-color="transparent"
        color="basil"
        grow
      >
        <v-tab
          v-for="(route, index) in routes"
          :key="index"
          :text="route.name"
          :value="route.path"
          @click="navigateToPage(route.path)"
        ></v-tab>
      </v-tabs>

      <v-tabs-window v-model="tab" :slide="slideDirection">
        <v-tabs-window-item
          v-for="(route, index) in routes"
          :key="index"
          :value="route.path"
        >
          <router-view :key="route.path"></router-view>
        </v-tabs-window-item>
      </v-tabs-window>
    </v-card>
    <mainFooter/>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import mainHeader from './components/mainHeader.vue'
import mainFooter from './components/mainFooter.vue'

export default {
  name: 'App',

  components: {
    mainHeader,
    mainFooter,
  },

  data() {
    return {
      tab: '',
      routes: [
        {
          path: '/',
          name: 'HomePage',
          component: () => import('../views/HomePage.vue')
        },
        {
          path: '/about',
          name: 'AboutPage',
          component: () => import('../views/AboutPage.vue')
        },
        {
          path: '/board',
          name: 'BoardPage',
          component: () => import('../views/BoardPage.vue')
        }
      ],
      currentIndex: 0,
      slideDirection: ''
    };
  },
  methods: {
    navigateToPage(path) {
      const currentIndex = this.routes.findIndex(route => route.path === path);
      if (currentIndex > this.currentIndex) {
        this.slideDirection = 'next';
      } else {
        this.slideDirection = 'prev';
      }
      this.tab = path;
      this.currentIndex = currentIndex;
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style>
/* Helper classes */
.bg-basil {
  background-color: #FFFBE6 !important;
}
.text-basil {
  color: #356859 !important;
}
</style>
